description: Configuration options for vue-better-echarts chart components

ColorInput.description: Color value - can be a CSS color string, theme color reference, or tuple for light/dark modes

ColorPaletteInput.description: Color palette - name of a registered palette or array of colors

ZoomAxis.description: Which axis to enable zooming on

ZoomProp.description: Zoom configuration - true for defaults, or detailed config object

ToolboxProp.description: Toolbox configuration - true for defaults, or detailed config object

opacity.description: Opacity for items outside brush selection (0-1)

outOfBrush.description: Style for items outside brush selection

BrushProp.description: Brush/selection configuration - true for defaults, or detailed config object

threshold.description: Disable animation if data count exceeds this

AnimationProp.description: Animation configuration - boolean or detailed config object

trigger.description: Trigger type (axis for line/bar, item for scatter)

showSeriesMarker.description: Show series color marker in tooltip

TooltipProp.description: Tooltip configuration - boolean or detailed config object

series.description: Column name to split data into series

showAllXAxisLabels.description: Force show all x-axis labels (prevent auto-hiding)

swapXY.description: Swap x and y axes (horizontal bars)

seriesOptions.description: Options to apply to all series

connectGroup.description: Group name for connected charts (shared tooltip)

zoom.description: Enable data zooming - true for defaults or config object

toolbox.description: Enable toolbox - true for defaults or config object

brush.description: Enable brush selection - true for defaults or config object

animation.description: Animation settings - boolean or config object

tooltip.description: Tooltip settings - boolean or config object

stackTotalLabel.description: Show total label on stacked bars

LineChart.description: Line chart for trends over time or continuous data

series.description: Column name to split data into series

zoom.description: Enable data zooming - true for defaults or config object

toolbox.description: Enable toolbox - true for defaults or config object

brush.description: Enable brush selection - true for defaults or config object

animation.description: Animation settings - boolean or config object

tooltip.description: Tooltip settings - boolean or config object

AreaChart.description: Area chart for showing volume/magnitude over time

series.description: Column name to split data into series

zoom.description: Enable data zooming - true for defaults or config object

toolbox.description: Enable toolbox - true for defaults or config object

brush.description: Enable brush selection - true for defaults or config object

animation.description: Animation settings - boolean or config object

tooltip.description: Tooltip settings - boolean or config object

ScatterPlot.description: Scatter plot for showing correlation between two variables

series.description: Column name to split into series

zoom.description: Enable data zooming - true for defaults or config object

toolbox.description: Enable toolbox - true for defaults or config object

brush.description: Enable brush selection - true for defaults or config object

animation.description: Animation settings - boolean or config object

tooltip.description: Tooltip settings - boolean or config object

BubbleChart.description: Bubble chart - scatter plot with size dimension

colorScale.description: Color scale name or array of colors

ReferenceLine.description: Adds a horizontal or vertical reference line to a chart

ReferenceArea.description: Adds a shaded reference area/region to a chart

ReferencePoint.description: Adds a reference point/marker to a chart

geoId.description: Property name in GeoJSON for matching
